facts.fact_text: The number of foreign tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka rose by 9.7% year-on-year to an all-time high of 277,327 in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: The number of foreign tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka rose by 9.7% year-on-year to an all-time high of 277,327 in January 2026

facts.fact_text: January 2026 tourist arrivals surpassed previous winter-season records, including 253,169 arrivals in December 2018 and 258,928 in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: surpassing previous winter-season records, including 253,169 arrivals in December 2018 and 258,928 in December 2025.

facts.fact_text: India remained the largest source market, contributing 52,061 tourists, up 20% year-on-year and accounting for 19% of total arrivals.

evidences.evidence_text: India remained the largest source market, contributing 52,061 tourists, up 20% year-on-year and accounting for 19% of total arrivals.

facts.fact_text: The Russian Federation saw a contraction of 13.4% in tourist arrivals compared to a year ago, despite remaining the second-largest source market with 29,540 arrivals.

evidences.evidence_text: The Russian Federation, despite remaining the second-largest source market with 29,540 arrivals, saw a contraction of 13.4% compared to a year ago.

facts.fact_text: The UK rose to third place with 27,134 visitors, up 24.9%.

evidences.evidence_text: The UK rose to third place with 27,134 visitors, up 24.9%.

facts.fact_text: Tourism authorities have set a 2026 target of 3 million visitors.

evidences.evidence_text: Tourism authorities have set a 2026 target of 3 million visitors

facts.fact_text: January’s figure already accounts for about 9.2% of the 2026 target of 3 million visitors.

evidences.evidence_text: January’s figure already accounts for about 9.2% of that goal, offering a solid start to the year.

claims.claim_text: The strong performance suggested the winter season peaked later and stronger than usual.

evidences.evidence_text: The strong performance suggested the winter season peaked later and stronger than usual, as the month outperformed December 2025, defying the typical holiday-driven pattern.

evidence.evidence_text: Sri Lanka Tourist Arrivals Hit Record High
